Body: Possible Duplicate:  Is this red star icon malware? How to get rid of it?  I have a Motorola Defy and in the notifications bar I am always getting red stars and bright green crosses. The Red Star is advertising 'dating' and 'meet hot couples' and the green cross is advertising 'get free apps now' 'win an ipad' and stupid things like that. The apps I have on my phone are Wheres my water, a flashlight map my run, picsart and two live wallpapes i got for free. Please help me get rid of these.
Title: Red Star And Green Cross Icons?

history.Text: I have a Motorola Defy and in the notifications bar I am always getting red stars and bright green crosses. The Red Star is advertising 'dating' and 'meet hot couples' and the green cross is advertising 'get free apps now' 'win an ipad'and stupid things like that. The apps I have on my phone are 'wheres my water' 'a flashlight' 'map my run' 'picsart' and two live wallpapes i got for free.. Please help me get rid of these. Thanks Zoe
Red Star And Green Cross Icons?

I have a Motorola Defy and in the notifications bar I am always getting red stars and bright green crosses. The Red Star is advertising 'dating' and 'meet hot couples' and the green cross is advertising 'get free apps now' 'win an ipad' and stupid things like that. The apps I have on my phone are [Wheres my water][1], [a flashlight][2] [map my run][3], [picsart][4] and two live wallpapes i got for free. Please help me get rid of these. [1]:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.disney.WMW[2]:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.telemarks.xperialed&hl=en[3]:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mapmyrun.android2&hl=en[4]:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.picsart.studio

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Is this red star icon malware?
